Question: How many peaches are in the baskets altogether?

Question: How many more sweet cookies than salty cookies did he eat?

Body: Jake has 11 fewer peaches than Steven. If Jake has 17 peaches.
Question: How many peaches does Steven have?

Body: Paul got a box of 267 crayons for his birthday. During the school year he lost 231 crayons while he gave away 308 crayons to his friends.
Question: How many more crayons did he give to his friends than those he lost?

Question: How far is the end of the cave?

Question: How big is each group of bananas?

Body: Rebecca wants to split a collection of eggs into groups of 5. Rebecca has 20 eggs and 6 marbles.
Question: How many more eggs does Rebecca have than marbles?

Question: How many goldfish remained?
